name: Be A Hero, or Don't
description:
A simple platformer made in a couple nights of work, based around teleporting using a physical projectile. Players shoot a tiny sphere, and when that sphere lands they are teleported to it's location. To win the game, collect all the letters of the word "HERO", or don't, your choice 

I was building this for a gam-jam, and in the time allotted I was unable to get one feature working fully, so as of now the game isn't fully completable. As of now, the sphere will only launch forward from the player, and can not launch in any direction as intended. I'm working on it.

KNOWN BUGS: 

  • As mentioned above, the sphere currently only launches in one direction
